title: Heart of the Storm
description: We won. But at what cost?I've been swimming in a sea of storms for so long now, surrounded by darkness, that it hardly feels like a victory. It was just one fight in the new war. The Old Gods are still coming, and they won't be playing nice. Which means we have to do everything within our power to play for keeps.Vampires, witches, werewolves, fae, dragonkind... the first Supernatural War saw us at each other's throats. But if we don't work together, the second Supernatural War will see our end. All of us.Vera's journey as Warden of the Storm concludes in Heart of the Storm.
author: Jessica Gunn
